languages.text: {n}Вы еще не успели договорить фразу, а когито-перо префекта уже усердно царапает инфопластину, вероятно, протоколируя ваш отказ и внося изменения в приказы. Маршал кланяется, и делегация законников покидает зал.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Вы еще не успели договорить фразу, а когито-перо Префекта уже усердно царапает инфопластину, вероятно, протоколируя ваш отказ и внося изменения в приказы. Маршал кланяется, и делегация законников покидает зал.{/n}
traits.speaker: VC_Prefect

languages.text: {n}Before you even finish speaking, the prefect's cogita-quill begins scratching at her data-slate, likely recording your refusal and making corrections to various decrees. The Marshal merely bows, and the delegation of lawkeepers leaves the room.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы еще не успели договорить фразу, а когито-перо префекта уже усердно царапает инфопластину, вероятно, протоколируя ваш отказ и внося изменения в приказы. Маршал кланяется, и делегация законников покидает зал.{/n}

{n}Before you even finish speaking, the prefect's cogita-quill begins scratching at her data-slate, likely recording your refusal and making corrections to various decrees. The Marshal merely bows, and the delegation of lawkeepers leaves the room.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Avant même que vous n'ayez terminé de parler, la cogitaplume de la préfète commence à gratter sur sa plaque de données, probablement pour consigner votre refus et apporter des corrections à divers décrets. De son côté, le maréchal Strachs se contente de s'incliner, après quoi la délégation prend congé.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Before you even finish speaking, the prefect's cogita-quill begins scratching at her data-slate, likely recording your refusal and making corrections to various decrees. The Marshal merely bows, and the delegation of lawkeepers leaves the room.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Avant même que vous n'ayez terminé de parler, la cogitaplume de la préfète commence à gratter sur sa plaque de données, probablement pour consigner votre refus et apporter des corrections à divers décrets. De son côté, le maréchal Strachs se contente de s'incliner, après quoi la délégation prend congé.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Antes de que termines siquiera de hablar, la pluma cogitadora de la prefecta empieza a arañar su tablilla de datos, probablemente anotando tu negativa y enmendando diversos decretos. El Mariscal se limita a hacerte una reverencia y la delegación de agentes de la ley abandona la sala.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Before you even finish speaking, the prefect's cogita-quill begins scratching at her data-slate, likely recording your refusal and making corrections to various decrees. The Marshal merely bows, and the delegation of lawkeepers leaves the room.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Antes de que termines siquiera de hablar, la pluma cogitadora de la prefecta empieza a arañar su tablilla de datos, probablemente anotando tu negativa y enmendando diversos decretos. El Mariscal se limita a hacerte una reverencia y la delegación de agentes de la ley abandona la sala.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你的话还没说完，沃尔图尔行政官的羽毛笔就开始在数据板上沙沙作响，很可能是在记录你拒绝的态度，同时着手修改各种各样的法令。至于斯塔克斯元帅，他仅仅是鞠了一躬。随后，两个部门的代表团便离开了房间。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Before you even finish speaking, the prefect's cogita-quill begins scratching at her data-slate, likely recording your refusal and making corrections to various decrees. The Marshal merely bows, and the delegation of lawkeepers leaves the room.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你的话还没说完，沃尔图尔行政官的羽毛笔就开始在数据板上沙沙作响，很可能是在记录你拒绝的态度，同时着手修改各种各样的法令。至于斯塔克斯元帅，他仅仅是鞠了一躬。随后，两个部门的代表团便离开了房间。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Noch während du sprichst, fliegt die Cogita-Feder der Präfektin über ihren Datablock. Vermutlich notiert sie deine Weigerung und nimmt Korrekturen an verschiedenen Dekreten vor. Der Marschall verneigt sich nur verlässt mit der Delegation von Gesetzeshütern den Raum.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Before you even finish speaking, the prefect's cogita-quill begins scratching at her data-slate, likely recording your refusal and making corrections to various decrees. The Marshal merely bows, and the delegation of lawkeepers leaves the room.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Noch während du sprichst, fliegt die Cogita-Feder der Präfektin über ihren Datablock. Vermutlich notiert sie deine Weigerung und nimmt Korrekturen an verschiedenen Dekreten vor. Der Marschall verneigt sich nur verlässt mit der Delegation von Gesetzeshütern den Raum."

languages.text: {n}あなたが話し終える前にすでに、総監の自律式羽ペンがデータスレートの上を走り始める。おそらく、あなたの拒絶を記録し、いくつかの法令に修正を加えているのだろう。将帥はほとんどお辞儀もせずに、法の番人の代表団は部屋を去る。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Before you even finish speaking, the prefect's cogita-quill begins scratching at her data-slate, likely recording your refusal and making corrections to various decrees. The Marshal merely bows, and the delegation of lawkeepers leaves the room.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたが話し終える前にすでに、総監の自律式羽ペンがデータスレートの上を走り始める。おそらく、あなたの拒絶を記録し、いくつかの法令に修正を加えているのだろう。将帥はほとんどお辞儀もせずに、法の番人の代表団は部屋を去る。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Prefektin kavramyazarı, sen daha konuşmanı bitirmeden databelasını karalayıp karar düzeltmeleri yapmaya başlıyor. Miralay ise sadece eğiliyor, sonrasında da kanun koruyucuları heyeti odadan çıkıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Before you even finish speaking, the prefect's cogita-quill begins scratching at her data-slate, likely recording your refusal and making corrections to various decrees. The Marshal merely bows, and the delegation of lawkeepers leaves the room.{/n}
